name: Scrapyard Defenders
description:
Game Name: Scrapyard Defenders

Developers: Jade Kosa, Keaton Callander, Liam Shelton, Philip Ritzmann

Setting/Story: Invaders obsessed with order and perfection have descended upon scrapyards across the world. Time to make a stand.

Goal and Controls: The goal is to survive. Click on a button to select a turret type, then click on the terrain to place a turret. Hold right click to enable WASD camera movement. Do not allow the enemy to reach the headquarters.

Sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com

Features

No hyperstacking

End stage when all waves and enemies are dead

Increasing wave difficulty

Enemy healthbars

Hitman by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3880-hitman

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
